name: Ludum Dare #36 - Terror of the Tomb
name_original: Ludum Dare #36 - Terror of the Tomb
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare #36 Compo. A little game made solo from scratch in 48 hours without assets or music.

The theme was Ancient Technology. The controls are explained in the game, but here's a little reminder

W A S D to move

J to Melee

K to shoot
